author: Staff Reporter
text:
Dindigul Mahila Court awarded life sentence to P. Arumugam (37) of Pethanaickanpatti in Palani taluk in a murder case here on Monday.

According to prosecution, police found his wife Vanitha (27) with burns at her house in July 2012. She died at Palani GH. On a complaint lodged by her father Kalaivanan, Arumugam was arrested.
title: Life sentence
